i1.blurb: After attacking or casting spells 4 times, Pantheon will block the next incoming basic attack or turret attack.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Pantheon''' gains a stack of ''Aegis Protection'' when he lands a [[basic attack]] or casts an ability, up to a maximum of 4. Upon reaching 4 stacks, he consumes all stacks and gains ''Aegis Protection''.
{{sbc|Aegis Protection:}} '''Pantheon''' blocks the next incoming basic attack from an enemy [[champion]], large [[monster]], or the next incoming shot from a [[turret]].
''Stacks of Aegis Protection cannot be gained during the blocking, also he cannot gain 2 Aegis Protection at the same time.''
i1.name: Aegis Protection
notes: * ''Aegis Protection'' consistently negates all [[on-hit effect]]s attached to basic attacks, with a few exceptions ({{ai|Harsh Lesson|Illaoi}}, {{ai|Devastating Charge|Hecarim}}).
* ''Aegis Protection'' will also block abilities that can trigger [[on-hit effect]]s ({{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}}, {{ai|Mystic Shot|Ezreal}})

q1.blurb: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing damage.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' hurls his spear at the target enemy, dealing them {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}}.
''Certain Death'' causes ''Spear Shot'' to deal {{as|100% {{critical damage|100|melee}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.
q1.name: Spear Shot

w1.blurb: Pantheon leaps at an enemy and bashes them with his shield, stunning them. After finishing the attack, Pantheon readies himself to block the next attack.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy, dealing them {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}}, {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for 1 second, and gaining {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon}}.
w1.name: Aegis of Zeonia
notes: * ''Aegis of Zeonia'' will be interrupted if ''Pantheon'' is disabled mid-dash, but will not prevent {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon}} from being activated.
** This enables ''Pantheon'' to block an attack while mid-dash.
* Since ''Aegis of Zeonia's'' is a targeted ability, targets who move out of its range will still be stunned.
* Casting ''Aegis of Zeonia'' activates {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon}} without removing any stacks ''Pantheon'' already applied when so.

e1.blurb: Pantheon focuses and unleashes 3 swift strikes to the area in front of him dealing damage to all enemies. Pantheon also becomes more aware of his enemy's vital spots, allowing him to always crit enemies below 15% Health.
description: {{sbc|Passive - Certain Death}}: '''Pantheon's''' basic attacks and {{ai|Spear Shot|Pantheon}} {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} all enemies {{as|{{sti|health|below 15% '''maximum''' health}}}}.

{{sbc|Active}}: '''Pantheon''' {{tip|channels}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in a cone in front of him at {{fd|0.25}} seconds intervals. The total damage is reduced to 60% against non-champions.
leveling:
{{st|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|100 to 300}} {{as|(+ 300% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Physical Damage Per Strike|{{ap|100/3 to 300/3|round=2}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
{{st|Total Damage to Non-Champions|{{ap|100*0.6 to 300*0.6}} {{as|(+ 180% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Damage Per Strike to Non-Champions|{{ap|100*0.6/3 to 300*0.6/3}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
e1.name: Heartseeker Strike
notes: * ''Certain Death'' will only be applied when ''Pantheon'' unlocks ''Heartseeker Strike''.
* ''Certain Death'' does not use ''Pantheon's'' {{tip|critical strike}} animation.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block a single tick's worth of damage.

r1.blurb: Pantheon composes himself then leaps into the air to a target, striking all enemy units in an area. Enemies closer to the impact point take more damage.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' begins {{tip|channels|channeling}} and, after 2 seconds, leaps into the air and becomes {{tip|untargetable}}. He then {{tip|blinks}} to the target location and plummets down, striking after 2 seconds and becoming targetable once more.
Enemies within the impact zone take {{as|magic damage}}, increased by up to 100% based on their proximity to the epicenter, and are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 35% for 1 second.
''Grand Skyfall's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced to 30 seconds if the channel is interrupted or canceled.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Magic Damage|{{ap|200 to 500}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{ap|200*2 to 500*2}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}
r1.name: Grand Skyfall
notes: * '''Pantheon''' is considered to have moved to ''Grand Skyfall's'' target location as soon as he finishes leaping (but he is still targetable for the entire channel despite visually disappearing).
** Enemies will still be damaged if '''Pantheon''' is disabled before landing.
